this_title: The World's Most Scenic Railway Journeys Season 5
trans_title: 世界最美风光铁路之旅 第五季
introduction: Actor Bill Nighy narrates as cameras follow trains travelling though some of the most scenic landscapes in the world. The stories of these iconic railways are told by those who travel on, work on and live beside them.S5.E1 ∙ Australia's Indian PacificSeptember 30, 2021The fifth series of the documentary series opens down under as we travel on one of the oldest steam railways in Australia on a coast-to-coast journey, and climb through the Blue Mountains aboard the iconic Indian Pacific.S5.E2 ∙ SwedenOctober 7, 2021Our magical mid-summer railway journey through central Sweden starts in Dalarna.S5.E3 ∙ Welsh BordersOctober 14, 2021A ride is taken aboard the Northern Belle in and out of England and Wales.S5.E4 ∙ AlaskaOctober 21, 2021Our journey begins in Anchorage, Alaska, where we board a luxury passenger train. We then head north to enter the vast wilderness of Alaska, America's largest and remotest state.S5.E5 ∙ Far North ScotlandOctober 28, 2021A close look is taken at the Far North Line, which travels from Inverness in the Highlands of Scotland to Wick in Caithness county, with a daily ScotRail service.S5.E6 ∙ York to EdinburghNovember 4, 2021Get aboard the magnificent steam train Tornado, coupled with 13 luxury vintage carriages.
chinese_title: 世界最美风光铁路之旅 第五季
foreign_title: The World's Most Scenic Railway Journeys Season 5
